main.title: Fast Appliance Repair Pro | Canada‑Wide Appliance Repair & Installation
main.description: Fast Appliance Repair Pro provides fast, reliable appliance repair and installation across Canada. Appliance repair in North York, ON. Appliance repair near me. Licensed, certified techs, transparent pricing, and 90‑day warranty.

about.title: About Us | Licensed Appliance Experts Across Canada
about.description: Fast Appliance Repair Pro delivers expert, factory‑trained service nationwide. Learn about our certified technicians, honest pricing, and customer‑first guarantee.

services.title: Our Services | Appliance Repair & Installation Canada
services.description: Comprehensive appliance services—from fridge & washer repair to gas stove and microwave installation. Same‑day availability, parts, labour & 90‑day warranty Canada‑wide.

blog.title: Blog | Appliance Care Tips & Troubleshooting Canada‑Wide

job-offer.title: Careers | Appliance Technician Jobs Across Canada
job-offer.description: Join Fast Appliance Repair Pro’s national team! Hiring licensed appliance techs, dispatchers & service staff. Grow your career with a top Canadian employer.

brands.title: Brands We Service | Samsung, LG, Bosch & More — Canada
brands.description: Fast Appliance Repair Pro services all major brands—Samsung, LG, Bosch, Whirlpool, GE, Miele—nationwide with OEM parts and certified techs.

samsung.title: Samsung Appliance Repair Canada | Certified Technicians

applianceRepair.title: Appliance Repair Canada | All Makes & Models Fixed Fast

refrigerator.title: Refrigerator Repair Canada | Same‑Day and Emergency Service
refrigerator.description: Canada‑wide fridge repair for cooling, leaks, ice makers, compressors. Certified techs, OEM parts, transparent pricing, 90‑day warranty.

washing-machine.title: Washing Machine Repair Canada | Quick & Reliable Fixes
washing-machine.description: Nationwide washing machine repair for leaks, spin, noises. Same‑day service, clear cost estimates, warranty included.

applianceInstall.title: Appliance Installation Canada | Safe & Professional Setup

refrigerator.title: Refrigerator Installation Canada | Certified & Safe

washing-machine.title: Washing Machine Installation Canada | Leak‑Free Setup

serviceAreas.title: Service Areas | All Provinces & Major Cities in Canada
